recipesJson.name: STRAWBERRY CREME
recipesJson.author: pierceshawn
recipesJson.description: MY FAVORITE STRAWBERRY AND CREAM YET AS WITH ALLOT OF PEOPLE THIS IS SOMETHING I'VE BEEN CHASING FOR A LONG TIME AND I FINALLY NAILED IT PERFECT BUTTERY TASTE WHILE STILL BEING VERY CREAMY AND THE STRAWBERRY CAME THROUGH PERFECTLY NOT OVERPOWERING OR FAKE FEEL FREE TO ADD SWEETENER TO YOUR OWN LIKING. FA RED TOUCH IS KEY HERE MY FAVORITE STRAWBERRY BY A MILE IF YOU DONT HAVE IT GET IT.
